name: Switch It!
description:
This is my game jam entry for Trijam Game jam(and first jam in general!)  It's simple game, where  you need enable the switches(inversed triangles) before they'll disable themselves.  Also they need to be done in the right order, because each of switch has a little bit different timer, so you need to figure out, which lasts longer by trial and error.

Game made in 3 hours, so there is "programmers art" and a few sound effects to make it a little bit more alive.

Also sound effects I've used:

Freesound.org:

level-up-01(when goes inside green portal) : shinephoenixstormcrow

Computer beep(switch enabling/disabling):phatcorns

SFX_Jump_32(Jump sound) : jalastram

Controls: WASD/Arrow keys to move, space bar to jump
